mapper.sql: ID, CREATEDATETIME, DESCRIPTION, ICONCLS, NAME, SEQ, UPDATEDATETIME, URL, pid, resourcetypeId, leafNode
mapper.select: select from t_sysuser_info t1 join t_sysuser_sysrole_info t2 on t1.sysuser_id = t2.sysuser_id join t_sysrole_sysresource_info t3 on t2.sysrole_id = t3.sysrole_id join t_sysresource_info t4 on t3.sysresource_id = t4.id where t1.sysuser_id =#{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and t4.resourcetypeId =0
mapper.insert: insert into t_sysresource_info (ID, CREATEDATETIME, DESCRIPTION, ICONCLS, NAME, SEQ, UPDATEDATETIME, URL, pid, resourcetypeId, leafNode) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iconcls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updatedatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resourcetypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leafnode,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update t_sysresource_info
CREATEDATETIME = #{createdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ICONCLS = #{iconcls,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEQ = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UPDATEDATETIME = #{updatedatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pid = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
resourcetypeId = #{resourcetypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
leafNode = #{leafnode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
